columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the database. For Hive compatibility, this is folded to lowercase when it is stored.

columns.name: catalog_id
columns.description: The ID of the Data Catalog in which the database resides.

columns.name: create_time
columns.description: The time at which the metadata database was created in the catalog.

columns.name: location_uri
columns.description: The location of the database (for example, an HDFS path).

columns.name: create_table_default_permissions
columns.description: Creates a set of default permissions on the table for principals.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: These key-value pairs define parameters and properties of the database.

columns.name: target_database
columns.description: A DatabaseIdentifier structure that describes a target database for resource linking.
